name: ChaseMaze
description:
< MONSTER MAZE >

In this game, you have the classic idea of a monster maze, but with a twist! This time YOU are the monster! Find the hunters that are looking for you and try to consume them, but watch out: Don't let them see you, or they'll catch you. You can only get them if they are looking away from you. Find your way through the maze and eat every hunter.

 --

Controls:

Use WASD to move around.
Sneak behind the enemies to kill them, but dont stand in the lights! 
Kill all enemies in order to win

--

Developers:
- Milan Sietsma
- Jur Moling
- Max Bakker

Artists:
- Jeremy Tur Siteur 
- Ralph Kuijpers
- Susanne Vermeulen

--
